description: Idiom describing someone young and inexperienced in the ways of the world, lacking understanding or insight.

examples.chinese: 少不经事时读的许多书,总要有些历练之后才能懂
examples.translation: Read many books when you are young and inexperienced, and you will understand them after gaining some experience.

examples.chinese: 年轻少不经事什么都不懂只会对这个世界抱有幻想
examples.translation: Young and inexperienced people know nothing and just hold illusions about this world.

examples.chinese: 少不经事时候的爱情和成年以后的爱情是没法比的
examples.translation: Love when you are young and inexperienced cannot compare to love when you are an adult.
